assessment_results.name: unify
assessment_results.details: Sessions last no more than 1 hour so you can put your increased fitness to use outside the confines of the gym. Icon ambassadors that are professionals in other sports or adventure seekers need more time outside of the gym. Warm Up, Workout, Goals for each Session, and Cool Down/Accessory work are always included. The unify Track opens doors to better experiences with improved levels of general physical preparedness

assessment_results.name: hyper
assessment_results.details: For some of us fitness is our sport. Depending on your personal goals the Hyper track provides multiple parts for each training session. Frequent strength, conditioning, gymnastics, and endurance pieces provide the most demanding track. Sessions last 90 min â€“ 3 hours depending on the time of year, cycle of training, and level of athlete. Our Icon ambassadors pursuing the podium at the CrossFit Games or making their first trip there utilize the Hyper programming.

assessment_results.name: dynamic
assessment_results.details: Training sessions include multiple portions while still focusing on intensity over volume. For those of you looking for more in depth training, enjoy participating in CrossFit competitions, or want to take things to the next level with your fitness the Dynamic track delivers without overextending you. Many CrossFit enthusiasts use this track to bring themselves to the next level while still having time for life outside the gym.
